{{cpp/title|swap&lt;small&gt;(std::basic_regex)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/regex/basic_regex/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
void swap( basic_regex&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; lhs, basic_regex&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::basic_regex}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|regular expressions to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
